name: Club verifies Intl SB Utility defaults to current signing period
Club can see a list of International First Year Contracts that fall within a signing period
Club can view signing bonuses of players they have signed
Club can add a projected signing to the Intl Signing Bonus Utility
Club can see increased Intl Pool if they have Comp Balance pick
Club is stopped from exceeding pool limit when signing a contract
BOC can see Intl 1st Year contracts for all clubs
BOC can manually adjust Intl Signing Bonus Pool values
